thread.title: I Wholeheartedly Endorse Sally Kohn’s Strategy to Give Us President Hillary Clinton
thread.title_full: I Wholeheartedly Endorse Sally Kohn’s Strategy to Give Us President Hillary Clinton

author: Alex Griswold
title: I Wholeheartedly Endorse Sally Kohn’s Strategy to Give Us President Hillary Clinton

persons.name: speaker of the house paul ryan

text:
I Wholeheartedly Endorse Sally Kohn’s Strategy to Give Us President Hillary Clinton by Alex Griswold | 10:07   
I have to say, liberal pundit and CNN contributor Sally Kohn ‘s plan to give us President Hillary Clinton makes a lot of sense, and we should definitely implement it as quickly as possible. Straightforward from here: 
— Sally Kohn (@sallykohn) February 15, 2017 
Let’s breakdown how this works, step-by-step. 
“1. Impeach Trump & Pence” 
Easy enough. Granted, I’m not sure what high crime or misdemeanor Mike Pence has been connected to, but better safe than sorry I guess? 
“2. Constitutional crisis” 
Ummmm… not really. The presidential line of succession is pretty clear. Republican Speaker of the House Paul Ryan would then become president. 
“3. Call special election” 
Actually, there is no constitutional mechanism to call a “special election.” On the contrary, the U.S. Constitution is explicit that presidential elections are held every four years. We’d just have President Ryan. 
“4. Ryan v Clinton” 
Again, no. We’d just have President Ryan. 
“5. President Clinton” 
Thank you again for President Ryan. 
So when can we start? 
[Image via screengrab]
